title: Fort Scott National Historic Site: Blind / Low Vision
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Accessibility     Blind / Low Vision              Blind / Low Vision       For those who are visually impaired, we offer the following services. 1. Our film is audio described. Please ask at the visitor center for a device that will allow you to access the audio description. 2. The site offers a cell phone tour that is audio only. 3. The text of our site's brochure is available in braille. Ask at the visitor center desk if you or someone in your party requires a copy as you tour the site.,  Â    Brochure in Braille Click here to download Braille reading software
